Text: M (1931) is presented here in its original aspect ratio of 1.33:1 & not 4:3.

I know it's blasphemy to say anything negative about M... still, I want to get it off my chest... there are passages which have absolutely no sound, and I mean NO sound... not even a scratch when one is supposed to hear footsteps & whispers... I have no idea whether Lang does this deliberately as some form of cinematic device or what... anyone?
